name: whispers of color throw
sizes_available: approx. length and width = 121 x121 cm (48 x 48 inches)
notes:
**whispers of color crochet throw** - a mandala meadow crochet along

welcome to the whispers of color crochet along! this throw is designed as a celebration of nature’s palette—beginning with a centered mandala square, radiating out in rounds of texture and hue inspired by a meadow of shifting leaves and changing seasons. whether you join with bold colors or soft tones, each stitch is a whisper of harmony and growth. let’s crochet a meadow together—one round at a time.

> this pattern is available as a free
> crochet along at the link provided.

**difficulty level | skills required**
adventurous beginner to intermediate

basic stitches in simple variations, simple repeats, color changes, shaping and finishing.

you will need to know basic stitches like sc (single crochet) and dc (double crochet).
special stitches explained and provided in the instructions.

**materials**
hook – 3, 50 mm (e) & (optional for tension) 4, 00 mm (g)
scissors
yarn needle

**yarn:**
vinnis colours – dk nikkim 100% cotton (50 grams/119 meters/130 yards)
weight – dk (11 wpi) 3: light. – approx. 1150 grams / 2737 meters / 2990 yards

•	a - natural x 5
•	b - baby yellow x 1
•	c - sunshine x 1
•	d - princess salmon x 2
•	e - nomvula's tangerine x 3
•	f - princess aqua x 3
•	g - kingfisher x 2
•	h - mint x 2
•	i - avocado x 4

**yarn substitute:**
using the same type of yarn throughout the project is recommended. the pattern suggests dk yarn (weight – dk (11 wpi) 3: light worsted), but you are not limited to this type of yarn. any yarn can be used if you take into consideration your sizing for the project will differ.

**tension | gauge**
gauge is not necessary for this project to be perfect.
however counting your stitches will ensure a true success of this project!

**size**
final blanket size including border -
approx. length and width = 121 x121 cm (48 x 48 inches) 

remember – if you use/choose a different yarn weight/hook size your blanket will be a different size!
